title: Missoni’s Milan Runway Show, in Watercolor
text:
Illustration: Samantha Hahn

At her spring/summer 2020 show in Milan this past weekend, Angela Missoni deployed her signature knits to great effect, with every pattern imaginable incorporated into her designs. The highly wearable pieces (you too can layer clashing patterns, truly!) were, for the most part, muted purples and browns, plus some standout radiant teal numbers. Silk scarves did triple duty as belts, neckerchiefs, and basket-handle accessorizing à la Jane Birkin, whose wardrobe swapping with Serge Gainsbourg inspired the presentation.

Here, see our favorite looks from the show, illustrated by Samantha Hahn.

Illustration: Samantha Hahn
description: Artist Samantha Hahn has taken the Cut’s favorite looks from Angela Missoni’s spring/summer 2020 Milan Fashion Week runway show and interpreted them for us as gorgeous watercolor illustrations.
